mapper.insert: insert into play( play_no, game_no, member_id, play_score, play_level, play_playtime, play_lastplayed ) values(play_seq.nextval, #{gameNo}, #{memberId}, #{playScore}, #{playLevel}, #{playTime}, #{playLastplayed})
mapper.select: select * from play order by play_score desc
select * from play order by play_level desc, play_score desc
select * from play where instr(member_id, #{keyword}) > 0 order by play_score desc
select sum(play_score) from play where member_id = #{memberId}
